description:
Done the whole song! :D

The time signature doesn't stay constant at all, I don't think I've got it perfect but it syncs up to the song lol.

The guitar parts were pretty bloody tricky to work out, there's no live performance of the first half of the song that I could use as reference so had to be done entirely by ear.

I think the rhythm-y bass section halfway through the song might be slightly off because it's very fret buzzy but I think you can be ever so slightly sloppy there and get away with it so I'm not too worried.

Anyway, hope you all enjoy !!
title: Dark Charade
